mapper.select: /* EnvtcherTrnngInstDao.selectEnvtcherTrnngInstSituList */ SELECT B.INST_NM AS INST_NM , C.CD_NM AS GRDCD_NM , A.HMPG , B.LOGO_FILEID , D.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY , B.ADDR , B.FXNO , B.TELNO , A.EXPLN FROM TB_CMM_ENVTCHER_TRNNG_INST A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_INST B ON A.INSTID = B.INSTID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD C ON A.GRD_CD = C.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_FILE D ON B.LOGO_FILEID = D.FILEID
